body.text: Cards are build using the Adaptive Card Framework, a standard that has is adopted by many messaging providers such as Microsoft, Slack and Cisco.
A card is defined by creating a JSON object that describes the various Adaptive Card schema elements that should be displayed.

Webex For Developers provides a [Buttons and Cards Designer](http://developer.webex.com/buttons-and-cards-designer) that allows you to visually build a card and then copy the JSON to your application.
In our next few lessons we will dive into more detail on how these schema elements can be used in Webex Teams cards.
